summary: The Protect Our Letter Carriers Act of 2025 aims to enhance the safety of United States Postal Service (USPS) letter carriers. The bill authorizes appropriations for upgrading collection boxes, including installing high-security boxes and replacing arrow keys with electronic versions. It also mandates the Attorney General to appoint assistants to coordinate prosecutions of offenses against the USPS and directs the Sentencing Commission to amend sentencing guidelines to treat assaults/robberies against postal employees similarly to assaults against law enforcement officers.
